title: Scientists sequence entire genome of Australian bilby
description: Under pressure from predatory foxes and cats and competing with feral rabbits, the Greater bilby has lost more than 80% of its habitat. Conservation work led by Professor Carolyn Hogg is designed to help save the bilby from extinction.

title: List of threatened species grows by 1,000, but conservation efforts bring hope for some animals
description: Over 45,000 species are now threatened with extinction — 1,000 more than last year — according to an international conservation organization.

title: SharkFest Is A Great Opportunity To Talk About Wave Energy, Too
description:
With SharkFest 2024 comes a reminder that wave energy and other renewables will benefit shark habitats by pushing fossil energy out.
